METRICS
Runtime (RDTSC) [s] time
Runtime unhalted [s] FIXC1*inverseClock
Clock [MHz]  1.E-06*(FIXC1/FIXC2)/inverseClock
CPI  PMC1/PMC0
Memory read bandwidth [MBytes/s] 1.0E-06*()*64.0/time
Memory read data volume [GBytes] 1.0E-09*()*64.0

LONG
Formulas:
Memory read bandwidth [MBytes/s] = 1.0E-06*(SUM(CAS_CMD_RD))*64.0/time
Memory read data volume [GBytes] = 1.0E-09*(SUM(CAS_CMD_RD))*64.0
-
Profiling group to measure read memory bandwidth drawn by all cores of a socket.
Since this group is based on Uncore events it is only possible to measure on a
per socket base.
